column2: Interactive effects of response and conflict expectations: whole-brain networks (fMRI)

This dataset of X04 work package 1b, comprises behavourial read-outs (manual response times) as well as fMRI data for a combined motor cueing - conflict paradigm from n=23 healthy young volunteers. These data shall reveal crucial insights into common and distinct neural mechanisms of expectation-dependent motor prepatation/re-programming and conflict resolution
